casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Ryan Gabriel GARCELL. No. 465A06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 25, 2007. Thomas Maher, for Ryan Gabriel Garcell. Charlie C. Walker, Asheville, William Hart, Senior Deputy Attorney General, Jeff Hunt, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 24th day of May 2007 by Defendant to Toll Time Periods for Perfecting Appeal:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 25th day of May 2007."
